lines.text: [Desperate for a drink and hearing a woman screaming in the distance]
Shit! Someone else is out of alcohol!
I loathe you, Makoto Mizuhara! You are nothing, less than nothing, yet you always get in the way of my superiority!
[Mr. Fujisawa's first words upon entering another dimension]
Christ! Where the hell am I? That's it with the cheap sake. I'm swearing off!
Hey Makoto, bones okay?
I'm surprised you're not gracing us with another one of your boring monologues.
You knocked 'em dead with your Big Sucker Gab Slash!
Arhh. It's MY move, I want to name it!
OOOOOWOH, How about a little date?
Don't you dare talk to me like that!
Oh that's good, right in the face!
AHHhhhhh, it's drinkin' time.
Why does my life have to be so hard in every world?
[singing]
Oh don't ever fall in love with a mountain man. You're heart's left in a valley as he climbs again.
[to Makoto]
Well, are you getiin' in this bath or aren't ya?
Uh, sister Shayla, i don't think that's a good idea.
Oh? And just why not?
Too much like dejavous.
Well, i guess we'll just have to follow them into that Bone Desert.

[Whining]
OhhhhhhhhNOOOOOoooo.
We're gonna die.
I figured out what turns you into Superman, being sober. The less you drink, the stronger you get.
That's it? Well I'll be damned if that's not a cursed gift.
You're so pretty.
I know.
My name is Masamichi Fujisawa, pleased to meet ya.

[exhausted]
The Control Key Power what?
Hi-Ho Groucho!
It's not luck, it's divine intervention! God's on my side!
What gives you the right to commit murder in the land of God?
I'll commit murder anywhere I want!
You don't destroy the world you're going to conquer!
You betrayed me, you lousy wind-up witch!

[Referring to Makoto posing as the Princess]
The prophecy clearly states we unseal the Eye of God for a princess. It says nothing about a queen!
You didn't cheat on me while I was gone, did you?
Oh no, how could I? You're the only object of my affection!
What about the redhead?
[shakes her head vigorously]
